MenuCard.style: Clean white card, large image, gold price tag (L.L), subtle hover lift.

Guestbook.style: Masonry layout of 'Love Notes'. Handwritten font style for comments.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure Gold text is only used on Deep Green or Dark backgrounds. Use Dark Green for text on White.
accessibility.rtl_support: Full RTL layout mirroring for Arabic version.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'LanguageContext' to handle EN/AR switching and RTL direction.
Ensure the 'WhatsApp' button is visible on all pages.
Use 'framer-motion' for the entrance animations and parallax.
The 'Guestbook' should be a static list for now, but styled as if it's dynamic.
Prices must be in L.L (Lebanese Lira) and formatted nicely (e.g., 1,500,000 L.L).
Do NOT use standard 'card' components from Shadcn without heavy customization (remove borders, add shadows).
For the 'Love/Comment' section, create a 'Masonry' layout using CSS columns.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
